name: Pour The Juice 2
description:
Elephant is hosting another juice party, but this time Ellie is around to help out! 
Serve the party guests, but make sure not to overfill or spill any juice, you don't want to ruin the vibe!

How to play

Use the mouse to control Ellie's trunk holding the juice jug, and hold down the left mouse button to start pouring.
Be careful not to knock anyone's glass out of their hand!

Credits:
Art, Design and Programming by Liyi Zhang: https://twitter.com/zhanlitheonly1
Audio sourced from various on https://pixabay.com/ and edited for the game.
